name: afterimage (itch) (gb_camera)
description:
afterimage / michael "gb_camera" dinh / for cdm 175 spring 2022

a game inspired by experiences i've had at convention centers for anime conventions with friends, as well as things "core" to myself, i suppose. late at night after all the goings are over and everyone's left (for better or worse), you walk out of the main hall and take in the space around you.

this game was originally going to be darker and focus on isolation and social anxieties, but i think i would rather have a lighter experience in the wake of *gestures vaguely* everything that's happened in the last two to three years.

this game is dedicated to the people and friends who i no longer talk to — whatever happened between us, positive, negative, or neutral, i thank you regardless for shaping me into who and what i am today.

wasd to move, mouse to look. you can shift to run. that's it! i hope you enjoy my meticulous (or non-meticulous) attention to detail and filling out a space, i guess.

more information in the included readme.txt; if you're playing the webgl version, you can find it on pastebin here. note that for some reason, the webgl version lacks videos on the CRTs. maybe this is for better or for worse? if you're playing this game on youtube or something (why would you), this probably helps.
